titleStmt.title: A letter sent from His Excellency, Robert Earle of Essex, &c. to the Lord Maior of London.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Septemb. 19. 1642. London, printed for William Gay,

notesStmt.note: Requesting a loan of £100,000 for the use of the army. -- Thomason Catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
